name: Bombix
description: Do you like shooting? Then arm yourself - the world of Bombix awaits you! You will find yourself in the shoes of a small but VERY dangerous fighter, gather together a team of thugs and show 'em all how to fight!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, Windows 8.1 Classic or Windows 10 Processor: 2.33GHz or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz for netbook class devices Memory: 512 MB RAM
